enhanced_description: ARKGENIQ provides employee engagement and well-being solutions through its platform, Uniify. This platform is designed to empower employees with modern workplace tools and boost their productivity. Uniify streamlines internal communications by delivering company updates through news, alerts, reminders, and announcements. It offers tailored engagement solutions and focuses on holistic well-being, aiming to improve employee happiness and foster connection among employees, especially in a virtual environment.
